name: Melissa Whitaker
what_you_do: Melissa Whitaker International provides high-impact, innovative solutions to help executives and their teams achieve alignment and drive profitable sales in an authentic way through coaching and consulting.
who_you_serve: They serve executives, teams, and entrepreneurs looking for leadership development, sales improvement, and business transformation.
bio: Co-author of best-selling books 'Pushing to the Front' and 'Beat the Curve', with over 30 years of experience in sales and leadership.
business_focus: Melissa Whitaker International provides high-impact, innovative solutions to help executives and their teams achieve alignment and drive profitable sales in an authentic way through coaching and consulting. (business consulting)
